name: ALPO: Way home
description:
" Survive a world where gravity twisted and collapsed "

The spirit 'ALPO' that lived high in the sky falls to the underground city for some reason. It's a 2D flat-former game where you have to find a way to get up from the gravity and traps of the underground city to get back to where you were.


The Underground city

It is located deep underground and has developed a device that can control gravity to overcome strong gravity, but due to human extinction caused by war, the device has aged, causing gravity to twist up and down.


twisted gravity

The underworld is now in a state of gravity reversed up and down. Be sure to check the direction of gravity and move.

SpeedRun

Speed Run Mode is also available! Clear it as soon as possible and post your name.
